body: Bloggings by Boz writes about "feeling" inflation: "And if I'm feeling it, then the average Nicaraguan family living on only a couple of dollars per day is definitely feeling it. Most wages are not going up to match inflation. Inflation along with unemployment are the top concerns I hear as I speak with Nicaraguans on a daily basis."
original_body: Bloggings by Boz writes about "feeling" inflation: "And if I'm feeling it, then the average Nicaraguan family living on only a couple of dollars per day is definitely feeling it. Most wages are not going up to match inflation. Inflation along with unemployment are the top concerns I hear as I speak with Nicaraguans on a daily basis."
title: Nicaragua: Feeling Inflation

sentence: Bloggings by Boz writes about "feeling" inflation: "And if I'm feeling it, then the average Nicaraguan family living on only a couple of dollars per day is definitely feeling it.
Most wages are not going up to match inflation.
Inflation along with unemployment are the top concerns I hear as I speak with Nicaraguans on a daily basis."
